name: screenRotation_setVertical
description: This function is used to rotate the screen of a display-supported SmartThings device to portrait mode.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to rotate the screen to portrait mode.
